baseURL = https://dry-taiga-90913.herokuapp.com/

Auth Api
for signup /auth/signup
request type = post
data = username,password,name
headers = content type : application/x-www-form-urlencoded
response = {
    "token": "<autogenerated Token for session>" --store in async,
    "username": "myname",
    "name": "name"
}

for login /auth/login
request type = post
data = username,password
header = content type : application/x-www-form-urlencoded
response = {
    "token": "<autogenerated Token for session>" --store in async,
    "username": "myname",
    "name": "name"
}

for AI images /api/upload
request type = post
data = file(image.jpg)
header = contentType: multipart/form-data
	 authorization: Bearer <autogenerated token>
response = [
    {
        "class": "single-breasted suit",
        "score": 0.664,
        "type_hierarchy": "/garment/suit of clothes/single-breasted suit"
    },
    {
        "class": "suit of clothes",
        "score": 0.935
    },
    {
        "class": "two-piece suit",
        "score": 0.625,
        "type_hierarchy": "/garment/suit of clothes/two-piece suit"
    },
    {
        "class": "charcoal color",
        "score": 0.995
    }
]
